name: Crazy Space Taxi
description:
This is a reimagining of the classic C64 game Space Taxi by John Kutcher, with elements from Crazy Taxi by Sega. Pick up your passengers, and take them to their destinations. Use your cab's turbo boosters for maximum speed!

TIPS

  • Use your landing gear to pick up and deliver passengers
  • Your landing gear also works as air brakes, stabilizing your cab
  • To boost, hold C and release. The more you hold, the more you boost
  • While boost is charging, press the direction you want the cab to face
  • Once you pick up a customer, money pickups appear around the map, collect them to increase your fare!

MAP
